price: Sie sagte: „Ich suche beim Allerbarmer Schutz vor dir, wenn du gottesfürchtig bist.
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
